Variable.Name: @ButtonHoverBackground
Variable.Caption: Button background color when is hovered

Mapping.Css: border-top: 1px solid @BackgroundColor !important;
.clickable(@IconOpacity); cursor: pointer;
border: 1px solid black; border-radius: 4px;
